References: Morokuma et al. 2014, PASJ, 66, 118; Balam & Graham (2015, ATel #7529); Blondin and Tonry 2007, ApJ, 666, 1024; Hammer et al. 2010, ApJS, 191, 143; Yamanoi et al. 2012, AJ, 144, 40
Telescope: 105-cm Kiso Schmidt telescope, MITSuME 50-cm telescope, 1-m Swope telescope, 70-cm reflector in Moscow, Liverpool telescope, Nordic Optical Telescope (NOT), Magellan-Baade telescope
Instrument: Kiso Wide Field Camera (KWFC), Apogee AP-7p CCD camera, SPRAT, Andalucia Faint Object Spectrograph and Camera (ALFOSC), IMACS
